ctx: Ina bo v Jadranu gradila nove plinske ploščadi
content:
Zabranjuje se masovno hidrauličko frakturiranje kao rizična i
opasna aktivnost, iako su ostala istraživanja metodom frakiranja i
dalje dopuštena. (marec 2021) - 
www.tportal.hr/vijes...o-20210319

karkoli pocne ina, mogoce pa ne gre za taksno metodo.
author: crt

ctx: Ina bo v Jadranu gradila nove plinske ploščadi
content:
Po tem članku sklepam, da je večji problem za Slovenijo ekonomska
cona na Jadranu, kjer sta Hrvaška in Italija pobasali vsaka pol
Jadrana, kot pa delitev piranskega zaliva. Pa se o tem bolj malo
piše.
author: MF-382439

ctx: Ina bo v Jadranu gradila nove plinske ploščadi
content:
hrvati so tako kot slovenci prepovedali frackanje - le da imajo
moznost plin ujeti tudi drugace (... in ima posledicno prepoved
drugacne neto posledice, seveda).

ja, jasno je, da je prepoved frackanja v eu tudi v interesu rusije.
ali ima se kaksne sicersnje atribute, nam to ne pove.

anyway, here you go, ta je se boljsi :)

Top lithium producer Albemarle Corp (ALB.N) may have to shut its
Langelsheim plant in Germany if the metal used in electric vehicle
batteries is declared a hazardous material by the European Union,
its finance chief told Reuters.

Lithium's pivotal role in electric vehicles makes it an important
commodity in meeting global targets to cut carbon emissions, and it
was added to the EU's list of critical raw materials in 2020.
author: crt
